sentences.en: And preached, saying, There cometh one mightier than I after me, the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose.
sentences.cn: 他传道说，有一位在我以后来的，能力比我更大，我就是弯腰给他解鞋带，也是不配的。

sentences.en: He it is, who coming after me is preferred before me, whose shoe's latchet I am not worthy to unloose.
sentences.cn: 就是那在我以后来的，我给他解鞋带，也不配。

sentences.en: None shall be weary nor stumble among them; none shall slumber nor sleep; neither shall the girdle of their loins be loosed, nor the latchet of their shoes be broken
sentences.cn: 其中没有疲倦的，绊跌的，没有打盹的，睡觉的。 腰带并不放松，鞋带也不折断。

trans.tran_en: a shoe fastening, such as a thong or lace
